caption.p:
Relative errors for ( a) global forest total carbon mass and ( b) averaged forest total carbon mass at grid cell level during the contemporary period. Each sub-panel (top to bottom) represents all compartments (Total), wood and roots (Wood + Root), leaves, wood, and roots at F
f = 0. Model numbers are the same as used in Fig. 4. [The figure was made using the Origin software (OriginLab, Northampton, MA, USA)].
